name: Torn: Left Aligned
description: This simple css clip overrides Torn.com's centered-by-default style by defining a left margin.

user.name: tn5421
user.about: I'm just someone that writes css to fix things that inconvenience me

additional_info:
Version 1.0.1: Added !important to the rule, because a new change to header.min.css overrode the custom rule on index.php
Version 1.0: Exactly as provided originally.  Many thanks to Mauk[1494436]
